title: 97/617/EC: Commission Decision of 29 July 1997 amending Commission Decision 97/252/EC drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorize imports of milk and milk-based products for human consumption (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 29 July 1997 amending Commission Decision 97/252/EC drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorize imports of milk and milk-based products for human consumption (Text with EEA relevance) (97/617/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 97/252/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision for Poland.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
